con:soapui-project.name: AutomatedDirectOutboundTesting
con:soapui-project.con:description: Sometimes the delays set in the testcases may not be enough. So we need to make sure the email the required MDNs/messages are received before we count event logs. Otherwise the event log count checking may fail.

con:testStep.name: Check Dispatched and Processed MDNs
con:testStep.con:description: Verify the email account to see if you got the Dispatched MDN.

con:config.con:expectedResult: Should have received the Dispatched and Processed MDNs

con:config.script: context.sendEmailSmtps("Content","Sending smtp messagae using trust bundles in database","alamelu@direct.connectopensource.org", "provider1@direct.sitenv.org", "54.85.35.69", "587","direct", context.findProperty('password'));

con:testStep.name: Check Processed And Dispatched MDNs
con:testStep.con:description: Verify the email account to see if you got the Dispatched and Processed MDNs.

con:config.con:expectedResult: Should have received the Dispatched and Processed MDNs in the email client

con:config.script:
context.withSql('eventdb') {sql -> assert 7 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventTable'))[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventTable') + ' where name="BEGIN_OUTBOUND_DIRECT"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventTable') + ' where name="END_OUTBOUND_DIRECT"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventTable') + ' where name="BEGIN_INBOUND_MDN_PROCESSED"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventTable') + ' where name="END_INBOUND_MDN_PROCESSED"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventTable') + ' where name="BEGIN_INBOUND_MDN_DISPATCHED"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventTable') + ' where name="END_INBOUND_MDN_DISPATCHED"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventTable') + ' where name="DIRECT_EDGE_NOTIFICATION_SUCCESSFUL"')[0]
}

context.sendEmailSmtps("Content","Sending smtp messagae using anchors in database","alamelu@direct.connectopensource.org", "provider1@direct.sitenv.org", "54.85.35.69", "587","direct",context.findProperty('password'));

con:testStep.name: Send an email from sitenv
con:testStep.con:description: 1. Go to the web site http://sitenv.org/web/site/home 2. Click on View Details button under Transport Sandbox section 3. Click on Direct Transport Test Tool 4. Enter your Direct email address in the Enter Your Endpoint Name text box 5. Click on Pick Sample button and select a sample C-CDA file 6. Click on Send message button

con:config.con:expectedResult: Wait till the email is received and displayed in the inbox. Check for 4 rows in the event table.

con:config.script: context.withSql('eventdb') {sql -> assert 4 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventTable'))[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventTable') + ' where name="BEGIN_OUTBOUND_MDN_PROCESSED"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventTable') + ' where name="END_OUTBOUND_MDN_PROCESSED"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventTable') + ' where name="BEGIN_INBOUND_DIRECT"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventTable') + ' where name="END_INBOUND_DIRECT"')[0] }
